message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and avoids any potential disagreements.
You can't be serious with an even split. I'm the one who's going to make a serious offer.
Considering the inflation, I propose a division that benefits Bob slightly more to compensate for the decrease in value of the money.
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not buying it. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but you're still getting a better deal than in the previous round.
